text: Kanan Mishra (1944–2015) was an Oriya writer. For her translated book Suryamukhi ra Swapna she received the Sahitya Academy Award from the state government of Odisha. She wrote five novels, four collections of poetry, one English featured novel and seven children's stories. ==Early life== Mishra was born on 1 January 1944 at Cuttack, Odisha. She was married. ==Death== She died on 7 March 2015 at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Indian women poets Category:Odia-language poets Category:People from Cuttack
title: Kanan Mishra
